title: Partial payments
body:
I noticed there is a possibility to block payments in the interface of my Windows Store developer account, but it is a "Boolean".
Would it be possible to get paid only a certain amount, leaving the remainder blocked on the MS account ? This could be interesting for the developer = smooth payments, not to exceed a certain threshold and....less taxes! And the interest for MS would be obvious.

comments.body: yes please. For tax reasons I need to be only paid a small amount and the rest be hold until I'm ready.
